column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: A police coalition from various departments have arrested 3 suspects thought to be involved in a ------murder-robbery------ which occurred on 15 October 2019
column4: in Khan Dangkao.------The suspects arrested were named as: Oeung Pheak
column8: and another 36 year old man.------The three are accused of strangling the victim to death and stealing his Honda Dream motorcycle
column9: an Oppo phone and the victim’s wallet.------TDN ------(Warning
